amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to Indo-Pacific partner capacity building and strategy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 705 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 705 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2019) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to Indo-Pacific partner capacity building and strategy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 705 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 705 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Menendez.
